revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3JTech |model=DWR |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/15/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TS8DWRWIFIROUTER |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186;RTL8186, 86190S1, L824C; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186;RTL8186, 86190S1, L824C; |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user=cameras |default_pass=cameras |oui=00:09:B5 |oui_eth=00:09:B5 }} This device appears to be targeted for use with [http://www.3jtech.com.tw/ '''3JTech''']'s IP cameras.
"RoHS", "DWR rev 0.2", and "UL and 94V-0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per a MAC label affixed to the FCC EUT, a 00:09:B5 OUI is presumed to be used by this device. :... however, the bottom label shows it with a 00:E0:4C ('''Realtek''') OUI... Both (or just the RTL one) may be used.
